script.Text: Hey there, youngster. My name is Gort. Care to hear my story?
Thanks. No one talks to me anymore. All too busy. Want to hear a secret?

Never trust anyone outside this city! Murderers and thieves, all of 'em! I ought to know. I used to be a great warrior. Been all over the world. Why, I have half a mind to go out again. Would if I got a good offer.
I understand. I had things to do when I was your age. Perhaps some other time.
NOTE to self - Hide Protrait should probably be automatic at the end of any convo
